title: Decompile C#, xaml and wpf application
content:
I saw the image of an app and I want to use it's source code but when using some decompiler I get over 500 errors. How do I use the code there are two files? I want to decompile the installer and the app itself.

  • Link to installer file(not decompiled): Comet Space Designer

  • Link to source code: Comet Source code

  • Link to the app (not installer and not decompiled): Comet Copy2

I know the installer but I don't know how to decompile the app itself. I used : just decompile, .Net Reflector, dnspy, dotpeek, ilspy.
